body:
I merged in Marian's changes and it looks like there's another error:

```
ERROR   -  Error building page perfsonar/faq.md 

Error: The page "perfsonar/faq.md" contained a hyperlink to "perfsonar/network-troubleshooting.md" which is not listed in the "pages" configuration.
```

@marian-babik: you can add commits to this PR (and thus kicking off the CI builds again) by pushing directly to my branch:

```
$ git remote add brianhlin https://github.com/brianhlin/security.git
$ git checkout -b <your branch name> brianhlin/master
<make your changes and commit them>
$ git push brianhlin <your branch>:master
```
